org.freehep.record.loop.test
Class StateMachineTester

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.freehep.record.loop.test.StateMachineTester
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, RecordListener
public class StateMachineTester
extends Object
implements RecordListener

This class can be used to check that a SequentialRecordLoop implementation follows the correct state machine.

Version:
$Id: StateMachineTester.java,v 1.1 2003/05/06 23:13:56 tonyj Exp $
Author:
patton
Source Code:
